sentences.english: In parts of Saint Emilion the gravel lies on limestone base.
sentences.chinese: 部分圣爱米浓产区砂砾层都平铺于石灰石土层上。

sentences.english: The edge of the incised-valley lacked the sand-gravel bed of the river channel at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 古河谷的边缘地带，往往缺失底部的河床相砂砾层。

sentences.english: The sandy gravel was filled in earth-rock dam and rolled by vibrating machine.
sentences.chinese: 土石坝填筑采用砂砾料，振动机械碾压。

sentences.english: The northern abrupt slope of Dongying Sag is the developed area of sandy conglomeratic body.
sentences.chinese: 东营凹陷北部陡坡带是砂砾岩体发育地区。

sentences.english: But the oil is viscous and awash in sand and other impurities.
sentences.chinese: 但是原油和砂砾以及其他大量杂质胶合混杂在一起。

sentences.english: The sudden arrest of his motion, the abrasion of one of his hands on the gravel, restored him, and he wept with delight.
sentences.chinese: 地面的砂砾擦伤了他的一只手，这让他恢复了神智。

sentences.english: The pedestrian lanes from roads to offices are made of gravel sub-base and paving blocks.
sentences.chinese: 办公室步行道由砂砾基层和铺设道砖构成。

sentences.english: It was le vel, and covered with fine hard gravel.
sentences.chinese: 地面平坦，铺着又细又硬的砂砾。

sentences.english: Vau. And he hath broken my teeth one by one, he hath fed me with ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他用砂砾破碎我的牙齿，用灰尘给我充饥。

sentences.english: We walk on and on in the dark over the loose gravel.
sentences.chinese: 我们在黑暗中，在松软的砂砾上不停地走啊走。

sentences.english: The prospector panned off bits of a sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.chinese: 探矿者淘选从河床里挖出的少量含金泥沙和砂砾。

sentences.english: Safety monitoring results of a dam with clay core are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某黏土心墙砂砾石坝的安全监测成果。

sentences.english: There are many scale-different sand-gravel body that developed in downdropped block of Chengnan great fault.
sentences.chinese: 埕南大断层下降盘发育了许多不同规模的砂砾岩体。

sentences.english: Parts can be self-tumbled with silicon carbide tumbling grit when aggressive deburring, scale removal and edge rounding is required.
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅翻滚砂砾时积极去毛刺时，大规模清理表面。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
